TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HierarchicalDataBoundControl extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl
Public MustInherit Class HierarchicalDataBoundControl Inherits BaseDataBoundControl

Docs.summary: Serves as the base class for all ASP.NET version 2.0 data-bound controls that display their data in hierarchical form.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>類別是用於擷取 ASP.NET 階層式資料來源控制項的資料，並將控制項的使用者介面項目顯示該資料繫結的 ASP.NET 控制項的基底類別。 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>。
不使用網頁開發人員<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>類別直接; 相反地，他們會使用衍生自這個類別的控制項。
控制項開發人員可以擴充這個類別來建立資料繫結控制項，可搭配類別可實作<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>介面和類別，衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>類別。 衍生的類別時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>類別，覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法來擷取資料繫結控制項的使用者介面項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法。 在大部分情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法是您將會覆寫衍生類別中的唯一方法。
ASP.NET 2.0 的資料繫結控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法相當於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法，並將資料繫結在執行階段呼叫。 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>類別來建立自訂的資料繫結控制項。 `GeneologyTree`控制呈現`pre`擷取從相關聯的資料來源控制項的 HTML 文字 樹狀結構的資料區段。
[!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#2)]
下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`GeneologyTree`控制項，在上一個範例中，定義，並將它繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控制項。
[!code-aspx-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/rootviewcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/rootviewvb.aspx#1)]
在程式碼範例存取的 geneology.xml 檔案包含下列資料。
``` <family> <member title="great-grandfather"> <member title="grandfather" > <member title="child" /> <member title="father" > <member title="son" /> </member> </member> </member> </family> ```

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>物件相關聯的資料來源控制項，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetDataSource%2A>方法。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.GetData%2A>方法呼叫以擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>從相關聯的資料來源控制項的物件以及如何<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>呼叫方法來擷取資料。 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>類別。
[!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#4)]

Docs.exception: A could not be retrieved for the specified .

Docs.summary: Sets the state of the control in view state as successfully bound to data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料繫結控制項維護指出它目前繫結至資料的檢視狀態中的值。 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.MarkAsDataBound%2A>方法將值設定為`true`。

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnDataPropertyChanged() cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnDataPropertyChanged ()
protected: override void OnDataPropertyChanged();
override this.OnDataPropertyChanged : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Called when one of the base data source identification properties is changed, to re-bind the data-bound control to its data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>變更頁面之後隨時<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在資料繫結控制項可以呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.OnDataPropertyChanged%2A>方法如果在初始化資料繫結控制項之後，變更此屬性會識別資料來源。 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>類別。
[!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#3)]

Docs.summary: Sets the initialized state of the data-bound control before the control is loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.OnPagePreLoad%2A>設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性`true`在其中的 HTTP 要求是回傳，已啟用檢視狀態，但是資料繫結控制項具有尚未已繫結的情況下。 此案例中是常見的控制項例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>位置在執行階段變更控制項的可見性。

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void PerformDataBinding ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void PerformDataBinding() cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub PerformDataBinding ()
protected public: virtual void PerformDataBinding();
abstract member PerformDataBinding : unit -> unit override this.PerformDataBinding : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, binds data from the data source to the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 實作這個方法，而不是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法衍生的資料繫結控制項時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>類別。 放置在控制項的資料繫結邏輯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>保留<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound>順序錯誤所引發的事件。
雖然基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>類別會提供任何特定的實作，此方法，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法所擷取的資料繫結的任何使用者介面控制項值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>方法。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A>從衍生類別中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>。 `GeneologyTree`逐一查看控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>和<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>從及其相關聯的物件擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>，並建立的資料繫結至文字的樹狀。 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>類別。
[!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/CS/geneologytree.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.GeneologyTree/VB/geneologytree.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void PerformSelect ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PerformSelect() cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PerformSelect ()
protected: override void PerformSelect();
override this.PerformSelect : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Retrieves data from the associated data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.PerformSelect%2A>呼叫方法時之後擷取資料時，將資料繫結至資料繫結控制項的項目。 衍生的類型覆寫此方法的預設實作不是適當時才擷取資料。

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void ValidateDataSource (object dataSource);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ValidateDataSource(object dataSource) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub ValidateDataSource (dataSource As Object)
protected: override void ValidateDataSource(System::Object ^ dataSource);
override this.ValidateDataSource : obj -> unit

Docs.param: An object set to the property.
Docs.summary: Verifies that the object a data-bound control binds to is one it can work with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.ValidateDataSource%2A>只有在呼叫方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl>類別的 mutator (setter) 的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>屬性。 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>類別會檢查已設定的物件型別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>屬性，以確保它是的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>或<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>介面。

Docs.exception: is not and implements neither the nor the interface.
